Header: Editing and Modifying Videos Created Using Diffusion Models Based on Text Input and User Interaction
UserStudy: This user study is designed to evaluate the quality of videos generated by various editing techniques using diffusion models.
UserStudyDuration: The process takes no more than 20 minutes and involves selecting the preferred video in a series of comparisons.
Footer: Video Editing Study · Built with ❤️ using Nuxt 3 & Firebase
AllQuestionsAnswered: You have already answered all questions. Thank you for your participation. ❤️
Information1: Thank you for participating in this user study. This research is part of a diploma thesis focused on the use of AI-based diffusion models for video editing.
Information2: The goal of this study is to evaluate how well modern AI models can perform video editing that modifies the subject of the video (e.g. changing a person or object), while keeping the rest of the scene consistent, including:
Information3: You will be shown short videos that were generated using different models. Your feedback will help determine how effective each approach is at achieving natural and visually coherent edits.
WhatToDo: What You’ll Be Asked to Do
WhatToDo1: Answer a few general questions about your familiarity with AI and video content
WhatToDo2: Watch several short AI-edited video clips
WhatToDo3: Rate or compare videos based on consistency, and editing quality
SavingProgress1: Your progress is automatically saved as you move through the study. This means you can leave and return at any time without losing your answers — even if you close the tab or refresh the page. When you return, you’ll be able to continue exactly where you left off.
Runtime: The user study will be available until {deadline}. After that, the study will be closed and you will not be able to participate.
DeadlinePassed: The deadline for the user study has passed. Thank you for your interest!
PromptText: Videos were edited based on the text:
Tips1: You can expand every video to full screen by clicking the icon in the top right corner of the video
